text: Kogda beda kosnetsya cheloveka, Vzyvayet k Nam on (iz lyubogo polozhen'ya): I lezha na boku, i sidya, I stoya, (yesli v sostoyanii stoyat'). Kogda zhe My bedu yego otvodim, On (derzko) put' svoy prodolzhayet, Kak budto k Nam i ne vzyval (O pomoshchi) v postigshem gore. Tak narushiteli Gospodnego poryadka Obol'shcheny deyan'yami svoimi
